name: Superdawg
description:
A 3D Physics Hot Dog Golf Game

***Strongly Recommend Downloading for Best Performance***Takes a while to load in browser***Lost my HTML optimized version to a bug***

I recreated the SPACE around Superdawg @ 6363 N Milwaukee Ave, Chicago, IL 60646 for my first 3D game.

A seagull has stolen your Chicago style hotdog! Get the toppings back from around town and finish lunch. 

Controls

Shoot - right click, drag and release for power (Longer the drag the more power)

Right Mouse - Rotate Sausage

Middle mouse - Camera an

shift - briefly become absorbent

A - aim

R - Reset Hole

1 - Low Height

2 - Medium Height

3 - High Height

Enter - Controls

Esc - Exit

M - Mute

tips: use natural rocking to reach high places, hit shift to stick your landing or stop bouncing, rotate left and right to stabilize yourself
